reviewText: I have seen both of these movies several years ago and I was so pleased to find them in DVD! The Secret Window is a most see movie and I would Highly Recommend it! I Loved it just as much as I did several years ago when I first saw it highly Recommend
Title: Identity / Secret Window

reviewText: Great plots.  Great acting.  These were sleeper movies to me.  I don't know what to say except watch them.  you'll be entertained and surprised, I hope.
Title: Identity / Secret Window

reviewText: To sit & marathon-watch the both of these!!!???!!  Two of my favorite actors & two of my favorite "Need a XANAX!!!" films!!??!!  Such decadence!!  LOL!!  Seriously, truly enjoyable films together for nonstop hand-gripping tension.  The only single film that does the same is "Dead Snow".  THE scariest film I have  ever seen!!  But, that's for another review!  ;)
Title: Identity / Secret Window

reviewText: these two movies are a must see..... the secret window is very good and suspensefull it keeps u on the edge of ur seat... identity is a good movie... u will enjoy both movies...
Title: Identity / Secret Window

reviewText: I ordered this movie set just for identity cause i love rebecca de mornay but thought oh cool theres another cool looking movie with johnny depp in it so i figured it was a plus which it was but kinda predictable too! So order the movies youll love one or both idetity just plain good and trippy scary and secret windows a lil slow but keeps you guessing
summary: I loved identity but liked secret window
Title: Identity / Secret Window
